entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Ignace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 p.m. EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to snow late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
